name: instHasLimitsCondensedSet
decl:
instance : HasLimits CondensedSet.{u} := by
  change HasLimits (Sheaf _ _)
  infer_instance

name: instHasLimitsOfSizeCondensedSet
decl:
instance : HasLimitsOfSize.{u, u + 1} CondensedSet.{u} :=
  hasLimitsOfSizeShrink.{u, u+1, u+1, u} _

name: instHasLimitsCondensedMod
initialProofState:
R : Type (u + 1)
inst✝ : Ring R
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimits (CondensedMod R)

name: instHasColimitsCondensedMod
initialProofState:
R : Type (u + 1)
inst✝ : Ring R
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimits (CondensedMod R)

name: instHasLimitsOfSizeCondensedMod
initialProofState:
R : Type (u + 1)
inst✝ : Ring R
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfSize.{u, u + 1, u + 1, u + 2} (CondensedMod R)
decl:
instance : HasLimitsOfSize.{u, u + 1} (CondensedMod.{u} R) :=
  hasLimitsOfSizeShrink.{u, u+1, u+1, u} _

name: instHasColimitsOfShapeCondensedOfHasWeakSheafifyCompHausCoherentTopology
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
J : Type u_2
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} A
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} J
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape J A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.HasWeakSheafify (CategoryTheory.coherentTopology CompHaus) A
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape J (Condensed A)
decl:
instance {A J : Type*} [Category A] [Category J] [HasColimitsOfShape J A]
    [HasWeakSheafify (coherentTopology CompHaus.{u}) A] :
    HasColimitsOfShape J (Condensed.{u} A) :=
  inferInstanceAs (HasColimitsOfShape J (Sheaf _ _))

name: instHasLimitsOfShapeCondensed
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
J : Type u_2
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} A
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_2} J
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J A
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape J (Condensed A)
decl:
instance {A J : Type*} [Category A] [Category J] [HasLimitsOfShape J A] :
    HasLimitsOfShape J (Condensed.{u} A) :=
  inferInstanceAs (HasLimitsOfShape J (Sheaf _ _))

name: instHasFiniteLimitsCondensed
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasFiniteLimits A
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasFiniteLimits (Condensed A)
decl:
instance {A : Type*} [Category A] [HasFiniteLimits A] : HasFiniteLimits (Condensed.{u} A) :=
  inferInstanceAs (HasFiniteLimits (Sheaf _ _))

name: instHasFiniteColimitsCondensedOfHasWeakSheafifyCompHausCoherentTopology
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasFiniteColimits A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.HasWeakSheafify (CategoryTheory.coherentTopology CompHaus) A
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasFiniteColimits (Condensed A)
decl:
instance {A : Type*} [Category A] [HasFiniteColimits A]
    [HasWeakSheafify (coherentTopology CompHaus.{u}) A] : HasFiniteColimits (Condensed.{u} A) :=
  inferInstanceAs (HasFiniteColimits (Sheaf _ _))
